questions: What are the advantages of the Go target?
How does Go compare to Bash target?

answer.text:
## Go Target Overview

The Go target compiles Prolog logic into standalone Go programs.

### Key Benefits

| Benefit | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| Single Binary | No runtime dependencies |
| Cross-Platform | Linux, Windows, macOS from one source |
| Performance | Excellent for string/I/O processing |
| Deployment | Just copy the executable |

### Cross-Compilation

```bash
# Build for Windows on Linux
GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o tool.exe tool.go
```

### Comparison with Bash

| Feature | Bash | Go |
|---------|------|----|
| Runtime | Bash 4.0+ | None |
| Portability | Unix-like | All platforms |
| Dependencies | System tools | None |
| Use case | Shell scripts | High-performance ETL |
